item.title: 3 tips on how to save an insane amount of time on clickbait articles (plus 1 bonus)
item.description: 3 tips on how to save an insane amount of time on clickbait articles (plus 1 bonus) “AI in medical devices, course or blessing”, “12 ways to earn passive money with no efforts”. You are scrolling through social media, click some headlines like the aforementioned ones and an hour later you ask yourself why your feet went to sleep on the toilet again. So here’s the ultimate chance to save your feet and a lot of time in the future.
